p.s: My 18 year old friend Bianca volunteered to work with children in an Education Center, located in a slum of Delhi.
For her, working with these children made her very happy.
They are couriouscurious and filled with love and acceptance.
They love to live, even though they had suffered so much.
They had a hard time, experienced hard fates and situations, but are happy everyday.
Bianca loves to work there, because it gives her hope and it taught her so much, even though it is hard and frustrating and exhausting sometimes.
The volunteering made her so thankful!
